lead_paragraph: LONDON, Saturday, Nov. 1 -- Some London newspapers today stressed the United States, nearness to open war as result of the sinking of the Reuben James, which, according to British sources, probably was the victim of one of the "wolf packs" of German submarines preying on Atlantic convoys.
